documents.document: That was some kind of incredible 4th quarter, @Patriots 👌🏼. Congratulations to you & the @AtlantaFalcons on one heck of a game! #SB51
It seems only fitting that Tom Brady scores the game winning TD in his 5th #SuperBowl win...whoa! #SB51
No matter how this ends, it's pretty incredible that the #Patriots came back from 28-3 to get to overtime. #SuperBowl #SB51
TIED GAME. What a 4th quarter comeback from Brady & the #Patriots! #SuperBowl
Whoa, now Edelman with #whatacatch! #SuperBowl
Is it safe to say that Julio Jones is the #SuperBowl MVP? #whatacatch #Falcons
And the 2 point conversion IS GOOD. #Patriots making this a bit more of a thriller in the 4th. #SuperBowl
Nice TD. Now those are the #patriots I remember. Not sure they can come all the way back but hope they make it a little closer. #SuperBowl
Say what you will about Lady Gaga, but dang can she sing👌🏼. #SuperBowl #PepsiHalftime
@EHClothing most definitely.
Whoa, what a run on the #Falcons 3rd TD. Not impossible, but it'll be a tough comeback for the #Patriots. #SuperBowl
@thimblewad that was my fave as well👌🏼. #JT4thewin #SuperBowl
Just finished shovelling the walk way, if I can do it, so can the rest of #YVR residents. No one deserves to fall on the ice out there.
@dropdeadclive One of the all-time best coaches in the #NFL so he will definitely be prepared.
@dropdeadclive definitely has the makings of a great game.
@dropdeadclive I agree. I also hope that it's a close game where both teams battle hard, it's not fun to watch when it's one sided.
Will Tom Brady win his 5th Super Bowl or will Matt Ryan break the #NFL MVP curse? #SuperBowl #Patriots #Falcons
Win or lose, you have my heart, @Canucks...lock stock & barrel. No stat will ever change that.
SUTTER🏒🥅🚨👌🏼. #GoCanucksGo
#BoKnows he's approaching another milestone. 2 more points for 100 #NHL points. #Canucks
Lots of time left yet, @Canucks! Here's to a solid final 2 periods. #GoCanucksGo
Did he stutter? Nope! SUTTER🏒🥅🚨👌🏼. #GoCanucksGo
#HENR1K...all THE feels❤️. Go @Canucks Go!
@IvanPrakash84 #GoCanucksGo
In honour of the @Canucks honouring #HENR1K tonight, here's the tribute I wrote just after he reached the... https://t.co/AnxIMaXoPo
Welcome back #HoneyBadger! #GoCanucksGo https://t.co/aVqOhrzSq8
Tonight is for #HENR1K, to all @Canucks fans attending the game tonight: I expect to hear @RogersArena LOUD for the captain. #GoCanucksGo
@ScottOake Henrik: what has been your favourite career moment thus far? #afterhours #Canucks
@OD_Birnell @uticaOD great piece, Ben! Thanks for sharing!
I'm over the snow...please come back, #Raincouver.
Nice work, @CanuckClay & crew👌🏼. #53HorvatMagic https://t.co/Hrai1vL9XW
Aww @Canucks I still love you. I'm fan today, will be tomorrow & beyond. Onto Saturday & celebrating #HENR1K! #CanuckAtHeart
@NewYorkPuck that sounds very similar.
@NewYorkPuck exactly!
@NewYorkPuck it's a problem league wide, they've been inconsistent across the boards. Some games these calls count & the next they don't.
@NewYorkPuck alright, but seems like they've been awfully inconsistent with calls like these vs the #Canucks in recent history.
Why does the #NHL situation room HATE the @Canucks?!
@1MichaelColeman @Canucks cheer loud for us! #GoCanucksGo
Here's to another solid 60 minute effort on home ice, @Canucks👌🏼. #GoCanucksGo
@CanuckClay I used to play piano, haven't for quite some time though & while I do enjoy singing, its not my forte.
@CanuckClay 😂. Best of both worlds meaning: music + #Canucks = winning👌🏼.
@CanuckClay @Canucks ooh that's the best of both worlds.
@CanuckClay @Canucks awesome! Looking forward to hearing it, you guys always do great work with your music videos.
@CanuckClay @Canucks will you be tweeting a link to the video for those not at the game?
@RobTheHockeyGuy can't tonight but this always sounds like a great group to be a part of! Keep up the great work! #GoCanucksGo
Am I disappointed? Yes, but not in the team. #Canucks #fanperspective https://t.co/dCWLxoM6iK
Safe to say that MILLSY has stepped his game. October+November record: 4-8-0. December+January record: 10-4-3. (2 shutouts)👌🏼 #Canucks
@anthonyacanuck thank-you.
Anyone want to grab me a #HENR1K poster from the @Canucks game on Saturday?
Be loud for the captain, @RogersArena👌🏼. #GoCanucksGo #HENR1K #HankYou https://t.co/9UGBi8yMn4
@forevercanuck you got this, Dee & you have our support always.
A fun piece to be a part of, reliving the 2011 #Bruins #Canucks playoff battle. https://t.co/TW55SheMfR
@BShareCohen thanks for letting me be a part of the piece 😉.
@RobTheHockeyGuy hope you guys cheer extra loud on Thursday!
My heart breaks for the world and tonight for Quebec City. No one deserves to be persecuted for their religious beliefs.
@Canucks @BoHorvat you made #CanucksNation beyond proud! Thanks for sharing some of the experience with us!
@Kayluvsredwings congratulations & well deserved 😉.
Bo HORVAT: 2G 2A👌🏼. Not bad hey, @Canucks? #BoGoesHollywood #Canucks #BoKnows
Well that was an entertaining game. Congrats to the #MetroDivision. #NHLAllStar
Simmonds gives the #MetroDivision the lead. #NHLAllStar
Atkinson ties things up 3-3. #MetroDivision #NHLAllStar
HORVAT for #NHLAllStar MVP? Definitely possible. #BoGoesHollywood #Canucks
SCORES! Bo Scorevat!!! #Canucks #PacificDivision #NHLAllStar
What a move from McDavid👌🏼. #PacificDivision #NHLAllStar
Faulk gives the #MetroDivision the lead. #NHLAllStar
Jones with the equalizer. #MetroDivision #NHLAllStar
Pavelski with the early goal👌🏼. #PacificDivision #NHLAllStar
1G + 2A & counting. Enjoy the final, @BoHorvat! @Canucks fans are rooting for you! #GoPacificGo #BoGoesHollywood
10-3. 10-6. 29 goals in two games. How many goals will we see between the Pacific & Metropolitan in the closing #NHLAllStar game?
Crosby to Ovechkin. #FoesToTeammates #MetroDivision #NHLAllStar
Atkinson with the ENG. #MetroDivision #NHLAllStar
Atkinson for his hard work, gets rewarded with a goal. #MetroDivision #NHLAllStar
And there IT is, Crosby with the goal. #MetroDivision #NHLAllStar
Holtby with a bunch of insane saves before the sunshine state brings the #AtlanticDivision back within one. #NHLAllStar
And Hall adds to it. #MetroDivision #NHLAllStar
Jones gives the #MetroDivision back the lead. #NHLAllStar
We all knew Matthews would get at least one goal. #AtlanticDivision #NHLAllStar
Tavares makes no mistake to tie this game up again. #MetroDivision #NHLAllStar
Swede moves by Karlsson👌🏼. #AtlanticDivision #NHLAllStar
The sunshine state ties it up again👌🏼. #AtlanticDivision #NHLAllStar
Just like that the #AtlanticDivision ties it up 1-1. #NHLAllStar
Simmonds gets the #MetroDivision on the board first. #NHLAllStar
Up next: Atlantic vs the Metropolitan. Crosby & Ovechkin on one side probably means another high scoring game. #NHLAllStar
#Canucks Bo HORVAT: 1G 2A & counting👌🏼. One game down, one game to go. Let's go #PacificDivision! #NHLAllStar
SCORES!!! Bo Scorevat!! #Canucks #NHLAllStar #PacificDivision
And kesler forces the LA crowd to cheer for him👌🏼. #NHLAllStar #PacificDivision
Another assist for BO! #Canucks #NHLAllStar #PacificDivision
No doughty about it👌🏼. #NHLAllStar #PacificDivision
Chewbacca (ahem Burns) with all the moves. #NHLAllStar #PacificDivision
McDavid doing McDavid things👌🏼. #NHLAllStar #PacificDivision
Bo HORVAT: 1 assist & counting. #BoGoesHollywood #PacificDivision #Canucks
@passittobulis the breakaway competition they took away was great at allowing players to show their different personalities.
Burnzie with all the moves #NHLAllStar #PacificDivision
Aww little kesler👌🏼. #PacificDivision #NHLAllStar
Bo knows creativity 👌🏼. That was close. #Canucks #NHLAllStar
Well done, Bo & Smith👌🏼 #PacificDivision #NHLAllStar
Let's go @UticaComets! Those jerseys look sharp👌🏼. #GoCometsGo 💚⚫️🏒
Enjoy the #NHLAllStar weekend, @BoHorvat! @Canucks fans are rooting for you! #BoGoesHollywood
The tough thing about making top lists means that while deserving names make the list, others deserving to be on it are left off. #nhl100
@thechewbecka that's absurd, they really should have the jerseys available for every player that's represented at the all-star game.
